_sText:
Installation:

For the test map look into the folder named "Test map"
Put the contents of the map named "Test map" into Steam\Steamapps\"Steam_username"\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps folder.

The prefab dosent matter where you put it.
But to use it open Hammer editor press "File" in the left upper corner then press open and look for Ak47_m4a1_scout_spawner.vmf

Prefab made by: Creon

Please dont reupload.
